text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar With less than 4.5% of the worlds population, we lead in sickness and death.

4/12/20:
Confirmed: 559,409
Deaths: 22,071
And these are just the KNOWN cases.

By any account, you have criminally failed America. #COVID19 #TrumpKillsAmericans #GOP #GOPComplicit #VoteOutGOP

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
